ast.name: API Title
ast.description:
[Markdown](http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax) **formatted** description.

## Subtitle

Also Markdown *formatted*. This also includes automatic "smartypants" formatting -- hooray!

> "A quote from another time and place"
Another paragraph. Code sample:

```http
Authorization: bearer 5262d64b892e8d4341000001
```

And some code with no highlighting:

```no-highlight
Foo bar baz
```

1. A list

2. Of items

3. Can be

4. Very useful

Here is a table:

ID | Name | Description
--:| ---- | -----------
 1 | Foo  | I am a foo.
 8 | Bar  | I am a bar.
15 | Baz  | I am a baz.

::: note

## Extensions

Some non-standard Markdown extensions are also supported, such as this informational container, which can also contain **formatting**. Features include:

* Informational block fenced with `::: note` and `:::`

* Warning block fenced with `::: warning` and `:::`

* [x] GitHub-style checkboxes using `[x]` and `[ ]`

* Emoji support :smile: :ship: :cake: using `:smile:` ([cheat sheet](http://www.emoji-cheat-sheet.com/))

These extensions may change in the future as the [CommonMark specification](http://spec.commonmark.org/) defines a [standard extension syntax](https://github.com/jgm/CommonMark/wiki/Proposed-Extensions).
:::

<!-- include(example-include.md) -->

resourceGroups.name: Notes
resourceGroups.description:
Group description (also with *Markdown*)

## Important Info

Descriptions may also contain sub-headings and **more Markdown**.

resources.name: Note List
resources.description:
Note list description

+ Even

+ More

+ Markdown

actions.name: Create New Note
actions.description: Create a new note using a title and an optional content body.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Set to `false` to exclude note body content.

actions.name: Update a Note
actions.description: Update a single note by setting the title and/or body. ::: warning #### Caution If the value for `title` or `body` is `null` or `undefined`, then the corresponding value is not modified on the server. However, if you send an empty string instead then it will **permanently overwrite** the original value. :::

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Search for a user by name

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of users to return, up to `50`

actions.name: Get users
actions.description:
Get a list of users. Example:

```no-highlight
https://api.mywebsite.com/users?sort=joined&limit=5
```

resourceGroups.name: Tags and Tagging Long Title
resourceGroups.description: Get or set tags on notes

meta.description: Full description of the note which supports Markdown.
